AppLU (Free) is a widget application\n

It's a fully functional free version of AppLU on Amazon 
To make it work, 
just add it to your home screen. 
After adding first widget, you'll be able 
to launch or uninstall your apps 
directly from your home screen. 

In this version you get only the smallest widget. 

Full version contains widgets in sizes: S, M & L with "last apps" list, different layouts and filter & more.
Name of the currently selected app

Last apps ran from AppLU. You can click to run any of them
Launch button - runs currently selected app
Uninstall button - removes currently selected app from the system
App filter button - switch between user/system/all
Letter buttons - click on them to find your app
Backspace buttons - remove last or all letters from the filter
How to use the widgets?

This help is based on a full version AppLU widget, but the concept is the same. 

Using the letter buttons (7) is very easy. Just spell app name that you're trying to find, locate appropriate letters and click on them! 
That's it. 
If one letter is not enough, add another one and another one, until the app is found. 
If there are multiple results, just click on the app name field (1) and the next one will appear.
